description:
Farai Madzima shares 'agile' wisdom at the recent Agile Africa Conference 2016 held at The Wanderers Club in Johannesburg. 
Agile Africa is a WITS JCSE (Joburg Centre for Software Engineering) initiative. Visit: agileafricaconf.com #AgileAfrica.
title: Agile Africa 2016 Interview: Farai Madzima - "have we made the customer happy?"
